title: My Pixel 2xl camera stopped working all of a sudden a few days ago. Tried clearing etc, didn't work
content:
Around 5 days ago, my camera stopped working. It keeps crashing, along with all the other apps connected to it.

I followed all the instructions - tried safe mode and it's definitely a camera issue not an app issue.

Tried clearing all caches and data, still nothing. 
Even did a back up and reboot.

Someone please help asap.
